summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3499 for the improvement of 50th Avenue Southwest, from West Lander Street to West Wait Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43350, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
